headline: Comcast (CMCSA): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q3 Earnings?
summary: Comcast has been treading water for the past six months, recording a small loss of 0.6% while holding steady at $37.95. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 8.8% gain during that period.
